description:
While Lila recovers from injuries sustained in her last mission, Najica flies solo to help teen prodigy Swaney and her guardian Daniela escape from the repressive government of Kirnovf.
Now that she`s become used to working with a partner, will Najica be able to adapt to the solo life again? Can she protect Swaney and Daniela from a deadly tag team of Kirnovf agents?

titles.title: Die tödliche Kugel kommt mit einem eiskalten Lächeln
Satsui no Dangan wa Kawaita Hohoemi to Tomo ni
The Bullet of Murderous Intent Appears with a Dry Smilee
殺意の弾丸は乾いた微笑みと共に
